This is the user manual for the Hitchhikers Guide to the Galaxy. This manual will hopefully answer any questions you might have. You may always access this manual by selecting “manual” in the main menu

GENERAL CONTROLS:


- Use the touchscreen to navigate through the app.

 - Pressing either the arrow button at the top left corner or the bottom right hardware button will take you back to the previous page


MENU ENTRIES:


- Dictionary: The dictionary contains useful entries on all relevant topics within the universe - towels, bypasses, the answer to life, the universe and everything and many more

 - Characters: This entry will give you detailed entries on the three most relevant book characters

 - Timeline: See for yourself! An alternate view on the first few chapters


Note: Huge thanks to http://www.hhgproject.org/ Most dictionary entries were provided by them
